name: VRC School
creator: Jellejurre, JustSleightly
description: Everything you need to know on how to make VRChat Avatar Systems. Documents SDK components, Animator systems, Expression Parameters, and more.

name: VRChat Beginner World Creation 101
creator: Lloydish
description: This 2023 tutorial covers everything from getting VCC to the absolute basics of unity to creating your own vrchat world complete with mirror, teleports, text and more! Learn how to do it all for FREE as long as you have the patience and processing power

name: How to upload a VRChat Avatar in 12/2022 and 2023 (Creator Companion) tutorial
creator: Fuuujin
description: A tutorial for absolute beginners on how to upload a ready-to-upload tutorial that you bought on Gumroad, Booth, etc.

name: World Image Guide, including a Template
creator: Maebbie
description: Align your World Thumbnail with great precision, to make the most of your window to the playerbase of VRChat. This Guide showcases an easy to use Template, that you can use to fit your existing thumbnail or as reference for a new one. There are also some tips on what to look out for.

name: What is PBR?
creator: Hyblocker
description: A page which aims to introduce people to the basics of working with PBR.

name: Unity Scripted Importers: Introduction
creator: orels1
description: This is the first part of the Scripted Importer series it looks into into what ScriptedImporters are and how to make one yourself. At the end of this tutorial you'll have a working texture generator you can program to create all kinds of procedural masks and patterns!

name: VRChat Avatar Dynamics Tutorial: Grab Prop Toggles Part 1&2
creator: akalink
description: A guide to show how to use Phys Bones grabbing to toggle props

name: VRChat Avatar Dynamics Tutorial: Couples Animations
creator: akalink
description: A guide on how to make animations that are enabled by specific people

name: Hold Toggles "Avatar Dynamics*
creator: Flower Of Good
description: Learn how to quickly set up toggles by holding your hands over an area for a few seconds

name: VRChat Avatar Dynamics Tutorial part 3: How to Test, 4 Level Testing
creator: akalink
description: In this guide in give you a brief overview of how test you avatar in editor, in game, and multi multiple clients.

name: Unity Beginner's guide for Avatar Customization
creator: Reina
description: This is a hand-made pdf guide for avatar customization for VRChat using Unity. It is not a simple tutorial. It's a 90+ pages document with examples and pictures explaining how everything works. This is intended for beginners.

name: LTCGI Screen setup
creator: Reava_
description: an extremely short and straight forward tutorial on how to use LTCGI for your VRChat world. Relatively experienced unity user only.

name: Avatar Dynamics Tutorial part 2:  Interaction (senders, receivers, and grabbing)
creator: akalink
description: I show you how to use the interaction systems in avatar dynamics

name: Physics Bones Tutorial part 1: Phys Bone Physics
creator: akalink
description: I intro the physics side of phys bones

name: Knowledge Index
creator: Haï~
description: This is a compilation of many things I've learned while building VRChat content.

name: Set up twist bones on VRChat Avatar in Unity
creator: Iconoclass
description: Set up twist bones on VRChat Avatar in Unity

name: Collision Audio with CyanTrigger
creator: Fionna
description: In this tutorial, Fionna shows how to make sound effects play on collision using CyanTrigger for VRChat's SKD3 worlds.  It will cover two methods--one where the audio varies in pitch based on collision speed, and another in which the speed determines which audio clip to play from a list.

name: Beer Pong for CyanTrigger
creator: Fionna
description:
In this tutorial, Fionna shows how to make a beer pong game using CyanTrigger for VRChat's SKD3 worlds.  This tutorial also covers a method for syncing variables to late joiners.

Download a drag and drop version of this prefab: 
https://fionna.booth.pm/items/3502870

name: How to improve and optimize dynamic bones with constraints
creator: akalink
description: how to improve how dynamic bones by using constraints to give move control over them.

name: Required Japanese Morph (Blendshape) List for MMD Dance World
creator: Original: カフジ / Translated: Tony_Lewis
description: List of Japanese blendshape name required to use MMD dance world. You will need English blendshape key and VRChat Standard blendshape key along with it.

name: Player Chime and Toggle Buttons - VRChat Udon CyanTrigger Tutorial
creator: Fionna
description:
In this tutorial, Fionna goes over some basics of CyanTriggers for VRChat's SDK3.  This example is a Player Join/Leave chime with multiple toggle buttons.

This tutorial will go over some basic concepts such as variables, Booleans, IF/ELSE statements in CyanTrigger, and how to use CyanTrigger variables between multiple gameobjects.

name: Spin the Bottle - VRChat Udon CyanTrigger Tutorial
creator: Fionna
description: This tutorial shows how to set up a simple Spin the Bottle game using CyanTrigger for VRChat's SKD3 worlds.  This tutorial will also cover some basic multiplayer sync logic.

name: UI Options - VRChat Udon CyanTrigger Tutorial
creator: Fionna
description: In this tutorial, Fionna shows how to make a UI World Options panel using CyanTrigger for VRChat's SKD3 worlds.  It will cover Post Processing options such as Bloom and Brightness, background audio volume, and toggles for things such as pickups, particles, and chairs.

name: How to easily join meshes and materials using TexTools and Blender
creator: akalink
description: A simple guide to joining meshes and how to use TexTools to combine materials.

name: Dance with your avatars
creator: Tony_Lewis
description: How to make your avatar support MMD Dance World fully. With this guide, you can make your avatar animate fully including face gesture and mouth movement.

name: World UI Setup Guide
creator: akalink
description: a text guide to setting up the UI canvas to be interactable within a udon world.

name: Blender Clothing (cloth simulation) Mega Tutorial
creator: akalink
description: A guide for getting into cloth simulation. A text tutorial is included.

name: Av 3.0 head prop constraint guide
creator: akalink
description: a guide to implementing props you can see locally that are attached to your head and you can move about your avatar.

name: Eatable Food with CyanTrigger
creator: Fionna
description: Build an eatable food prefab from scratch, using the CyanTrigger system

name: Full Time Zones data with city positions
creator: Tony_Lewis
description: All of time zones format include quest support with location of 1 of city/town included.

name: Udon/U# + Test Driven Development
creator: Guribo
description: This tutorial covers some basics of testing in Unity and specifically targets world creation using the VRChat SDK and Udon in combination with Udon Sharp created by Merlin. Additionally CynEmu is used to play-test the created UdonBehaviour script in the Unity Editor.

name: orels1's Tool Selection
creator: orels1
description: A list of tools I either made myself, use everyday, or can recommend overall. Feel free to ask questions about any of them

name: Audio Demo
creator: Text Logo
description: A world to demonstrate audio sources and Udon audio tools․

name: Prefabs TLX Talks Archive
creator: orels1
description: A searchable archive of the talks from the Prefabs TLX event

name: How to Atlas Everything in your World
creator: Maebbie
description: Hard-optimize your World by UV mapping everything on the same texture atlas, including tiling textures. This will retain high levels of detail and an extremely low drawcall count as you have seen prominently in the worlds Eventide and Atoll of Ether.

name: Animate NPCs in your world with MOCAP
creator: Ruuubick
description: Tutorial combining ShaderMotion and WorldConstraint to enable people to use FBT to record animations within VRChat and then generate animation files in Unity.

name: Optimizing your VR/AR Experiences
creator: Unity Technologies
description: How to optimize VR and AR experiences in Unity. demo is in 2019 but use as ref for idea.

name: Occlusion Culling and You
creator: Silent
description: Occlusion culling is a complicated topic, and pretty easy to misunderstand. With this guide, I'm hoping I can give people a better idea of when and where to use it.

name: Bakery (Manual)
creator: Mr.F
description: General usage reference for Bakery Lightmapper

name: Level Design -In Pursuit of Better Levels-
creator: Alex
description:
Level Design document where I gather useful senior dev knowledge.
The goal was to gather up all this knowledge in one place. Both for learning and as reference.

name: 2 hand guns with constraints for vrchat 2018 unity
creator: HelloHa?
description: How to set up 2 handed guns in VRChat using constraints.

name: FreezeFrame your avatar in VRChat (Unity 2018)
creator: HelloHa?
description: This is how to Freeze your avatar in place and simply walk away using constraints

name: VRChat Baked Lighting Tutorial
creator: akalink
description: a lighting tutorial for those who have never baked lighting before as well as those who have baked lighting and don't understand it well.

name: MIDI and OSC Trigger Tutorial
creator: akalink
description: A quick guide to setting up midi and osc in sdk2, and how to set up reaper to control the midi triggers.

name: How to setup your birthday on Birthday Bot?
creator: Tony_Lewis
description: Quick guide of how to setup Birthday Bot on VRCPrefab

name: Reflection Probes and Unity
creator: Silent
description: A guide on using Reflection Probes in worlds.

name: Avatars 3.0 Base Layer Written Guide
creator: Child of the Beast
description: A written guide on Animation controllers and the Base Layer for Avatars 3.0

name: Avatar 3.0 written setup guide
creator: .necro
description: A written guide on setting up Avatars 3.0

name: (For v2.1.2.1) How to make QV Pen compatible with Oculus Quest?
creator: Tony_Lewis
description: Updated version of customise to make QvPen compatible for version 2.1.2.1 due to version change.

name: How to make QV Pen compatible with Oculus Quest?
creator: ureishi
description: Make QV Pen Prefab compatible with Oculus Quest

name: Dynamic Bones Settings and Optimization
creator: akalink
description: a brief overview of how to get some good looking dynamic bones and how to bring it into blender to optimize it.

name: Unity Lighting Reference Card
creator: Unity Technologies
description: A reference card for lighting modes. Remember that Directional mode uses twice as much texture memory as Non-directional mode and has a slightly higher shading cost. One cheap RT Dir light w/o shadows and indirect is ok instead.

name: How To install VirtualLens and EmoteSwitch
creator: Lhun
description: A basic text tutorial on installing virtuallens to your avatar using emoteswitch

name: Clip-Art to 3d, the easy way
creator: Lhun
description: Using an example of making a braid for hair, I go over how to inflate clip art to rapidly prototype a mesh. Many things such as pins, signs, logos etc are less steps.

name: Digging old projects from shed
creator: Tony_Lewis
description: Points to check when considering to update Unity 6.x/5.x project to latest Unity version supported by VRChat.

name: How to bring VRM avatar to VRChat?
creator: Tony_Lewis
description: Way to convert VRM model to VRChat format

name: How to take your avatar with you?
creator: Tony_Lewis
description: Instructions to convert your avatars into VRM format to use with 3rd party platform.

name: Animator Trigger Overloader Tutorial
creator: akalink
description: How to prevent animation triggers from over-firing.

name: Getting Started with UdonPie  - the Python-based UDON-assembly compiler
creator: orels1
description: An introductory guide to UdonPie language and compiler as well as some nice tips that will improve your development experience using it

name: General How To playlist for Beginners
creator: Lhun
description: Rapid fire tutorials to ease new players into content creation

name: Swap baked Lightmaps (for Day & Night mode on Quest & PC)
creator: Maebbie
description: Tutorial on how to swap out baked lightmaps in #VRChat , as you have seen with the Day & Night mode toggle in Atoll of Ether.

name: How to use Audio Filters like a Champ
creator: akalink
description: A basic rundown on how to achieve world audio effects.

name: Offset collision
creator: Phasedragon
description: Requires standard assets. Simple prefab and readme that shows how to set up offset collision in order to have effectively infinite unique detectable objects, such as keys and keyholes.

name: Baking terrain, fixing black grass
creator: akalink
description: I go over a basic work around to bake light and still use grass in unity terrain system in vrchat

name: Avatar Skin Recoloring
creator: akalink
description: shows you how to recolor the skin on avatar easily with gimp

name: Making a Theater in VRChat or: How The Vantage Works
creator: OwlBoy
description: An overview of various features of The Vantage and tips for encoding video to playback in a theater in VRChat.

name: Substance Designer overview for vr chat
creator: El Fideo Rubio
description: This is an overview to showcase the power of substance designer and how you could use it to texture your assets in your world.

name: Avatar Eyetracking Doc
description: Guide for avatar eye tracking setup

name: Posable Doll in VRChat
creator: Q
description: A quick write down of how I made the Posable Doll that Mimi has in Avatar Testing

name: Audio Optimization for VRChat Video Guide
creator: akalink
description: A guide that explains what setting should be used for audio and why it is important

name: Post Processing and You
creator: Silent
description: A guide explaining the installation, setup, and use of post processing, with details you'll struggle to find anywhere else! Despite the name, setting up post processing early in your map creation can make all the difference in your lighting! Why? Well, read the guide to find out.

name: Sprite/Pixel Avatars without blender
creator: Akalink
description: A tutorial on how to create sprite avatars with just unity

name: VRChat World Trigger Video Tutorials
creator: CyanLaser
description: Video tutorials going over different VRChat triggers mechanics
